extensionDescription.message: Adds an option to right-click menu that downloads the link with put.io.

downloadMenuItem.description: Title of context menu item that downloads the selected link.

welcomeNotificationMessage.message: You can use the right click menu for downloading items to your put.io account!!

transferStartNotificationTitle.description: Title of the transfer start notification

transferStartNotificationMessage.message: We are starting your transfer. You can click this message and go to your transfers page
transferStartNotificationMessage.description: Body of the transfer start notification

transferFailureNotificationTitle.description: Title of the transfer failure notification

transferFailureNotificationMessage.message: We are unable to download that :-/
transferFailureNotificationMessage.description: Description of the transfer failure notification
